name: True BMX
description:
True Bmx is an amazing and addictive racing game full of adventures. and it's suitable for all ages

True Bmx is a 2D bike riding game, that’s packed full of challenges that will see you pulling all kinds of air tricks and grinds with combos that will blow your mind.



Features:

- Easy to use Controls with a special “Easy” mode for casual players.


- A story mode to unlock the full goodness.

- Beautiful HD graphics and fluid animations


- Capture Screen Shot during replay and post on Facebook or Twitter. Great for showing off massive combo scores.


- Tap screen flip

- and Much More!!
